LanguageData.GMT_Hediff_Berserker_Ire.label: Berserker Ire
LanguageData.GMT_Hediff_Berserker_Ire.description: This person is getting angry. You won't like them when they're angry.
LanguageData.GMT_Hediff_Berserker_Rage.label: Berserker Rage
LanguageData.GMT_Hediff_Berserker_Rage.description: This person has flown into a berserk rage. They are significantly more capable in combat, but will be uncontrollable until they calm down.
